description: Provides legal guardianship to adults 18 years of age and older who have been adjudicated legally incapacitated by the probate court, who have no relatives or friends willing or able to act as legal guardian and the legally incapacitated person is indigent. Assists with the health and welfare of legally incapacitated persons by using community resources to assure that their basic needs are met. Also acts as a monitor and an advocate to ensure that each ward receives benefits he/she is entitled to.
name: GUARDIANSHIP PROGRAM OF DADE COUNTY, INC.
